complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Server-Sent Events (SSE) Infrastructure for CV2WEB
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the SSE infrastructure setup, endpoint creation, message type definitions, connection management, error handling, authentication, rate limiting, and client integration into separate subtasks for focused implementation and testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple technical components (SSE protocol, concurrent connection management, standardized message formats, error handling, authentication, rate limiting, and client integration), each requiring careful design and testing. The complexity is high due to real-time requirements, concurrency, and integration with multiple workflows[1][2][3].

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Extend LiveLogger with SSE Integration and Enhanced Tracking
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for SSE integration, correlation ID implementation, performance metrics collection, log aggregation, enhanced API, SSE message types, unit testing, integration testing, load testing, and manual testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Extending LiveLogger requires deep integration with SSE, cross-service correlation, performance metrics, and log aggregation. The complexity is elevated by the need for robust connection management, real-time broadcasting, correlation tracking, and comprehensive testing across multiple scenarios[1][2][3].

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Claude Code SDK for Advanced Portfolio Generation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into subtasks for SDK setup, retry logic, caching, streaming, tool permissions, hybrid AI service, error handling, configuration management, unit testing, integration testing, and security testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is highly complex due to the integration of advanced AI SDKs, hybrid workflows, retry and caching logic, streaming, permission management, error handling, and extensive testing. complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Daytona SDK for Isolated Sandbox Environments
